name: county-cricket-live
description: A simple web application that shows live and upcoming county cricket streams from YouTube. The site automatically updates every 15 minutes during the day to show the latest streams.

scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.dev: mkdir -p public/data && cp data/* public/data && concurrently "tailwindcss -i css/styles.css -o public/css/compiled.css --watch" "esbuild js/app.js --bundle --outfile=public/js/bundle.js --watch" "live-server public --no-browser --watch=public/**/*"
